totalTime.title: Total time in miliseconds
totalTime.description: Total miliseconds of the stopwatch after applying offset and calculated miliseconds after last startTime, is is always a positive value and backwards value does not affect this value

startTime.title: Start time in miliseconds since epoch
startTime.description: Start time in miliseconds since epoch, is null if the stopwatch is stopped or paused

isEnded.title: Stopwatch reach limitMiliseconds
isEnded.description: If defined limitMiliseconds then this value will be true when totalTime is equal or greater than limitMiliseconds

hours.title: Hours
hours.description: Hours of the stopwatch, this will be a countdown if backwards is set and limitMiliseconds greater than 0

minutes.title: Minutes
minutes.description: Minutes of the stopwatch, this will be a countdown if backwards is set and limitMiliseconds greater than 0

seconds.title: Seconds
seconds.description: Seconds of the stopwatch, this will be a countdown if backwards is set and limitMiliseconds greater than 0

limitMiliseconds.title: Limit miliseconds
limitMiliseconds.description: If this value is greater than 0 then stopwatch will be stopped when totalTime is equal or greater than this value

backwards.title: Backwards
backwards.description: If this value is true and limitMiliseconds greater than 0 then stopwatch will be a countdown
